data.what_is: Jellyreach is email and SMS marketing automation software. It's created to deliver automated, relevant, and timely messages aligned with contacts preferences. Features include unlimited workspaces, drag and drop campaign editor, pre-designed templates, marketing automation with pre-built scenarios, unlimited segments , UTM tracking, integration with Amazon SES, Mailgun, and Twilio, and more.
data.product_description: Jellyreach is email and SMS marketing automation software. It's created to deliver automated, relevant, and timely messages aligned with contacts preferences. Features include unlimited workspaces, drag and drop campaign editor, pre-designed templates, marketing automation with pre-built scenarios, unlimited segments , UTM tracking, integration with Amazon SES, Mailgun, and Twilio, and more.
data.company_location: Tuzla, Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

initial_reviews.review_title: Nice app, so much potential, but this isn't mature yet.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jellyreach?
The developers are responsive. However, so many features are still missing. I'm waiting for the implementation of items on the roadmap. I like the part where I can use Amazon AWS SES.

What do you dislike about Jellyreach?
I've had JR for a few months now and stopped using it as it is missing key features. Also, I don't understand why some data (contacts) keep on appearing a few times. And I cannot delete these duplicate contacts in bulk. So I stopped using it.

What problems is Jellyreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email deliverability is great. Emails land on inboxes.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best email and sms marketing software
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jellyreach?
Convey mechanized, pertinent, and opportune messages lined up with clients' inclinations. All along, you will know how to get ready for missions without any preparation or utilizing pre-planned formats. Associate Your Data Easily

What do you dislike about Jellyreach?
it is new software I try and didn't find much to dislike. Get a One-time Payment Account to access account. as they have many competitors those provide same software

What problems is Jellyreach solving and how is that benefiting you?
overall everything is in perfect shape and would love to recommend it to others and my colleague will be happy to do this
